publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6359 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Membership—That the Parliament agrees that— Alasdair Allan be appointed to replace Aileen Campbell on the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee; Stuart McMillan be appointed to replace Willie Coffey on the Equal Opportunities Committee; Dave Thompson be appointed to replace Angela Constance on the Justice Committee; Alasdair Morgan be appointed to replace Alasdair Allan on the Local Government and Communities Committee; Aileen Campbell be appointed to replace Alasdair Morgan on the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee; Angela Constance be appointed to replace Dave Thompson on the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee.
